text: Pedro Infante Cruz (; 18 November 1917 – 15 April 1957) was a Mexican actor and ranchera singer. He was born in Mazatlán, Mexico. He was married to actress Irma Dorantes. He played the main character in Tizoc (1957). Infante died in an airplane crash near Mérida, Mexico on 15 April 1957 at the age of 39. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Aviation deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican singers
title: Pedro Infante
